保证 bǎozhèng ensure
保证训练效果 bǎozhèng xùnliàn xiàoguǒ Guaranteed training effect
技巧 jìqiǎo Skill
实用的技巧 shíyòng de jìqiǎo practical tips
第一：力竭 dì yī: Lì jié First: Exhaustion
为止 wéizhǐ until
没有力气为止 méiyǒu lìqì wéizhǐ until no strength
（尽量碰到墙面为止； (jǐnliàng pèng dào qiáng miàn wéizhǐ; (Try to touch the wall until;
防止起茧子） fángzhǐ qǐ jiǎnzi) prevent calluses)
偷懒 tōulǎn be lazy
11 导致练不到位 dǎozhì liàn bù dàowèi lead to poor practice
复合动作 fùhé dòngzuò compound action
神经 shénjīng nerve
神经恢复不过来 shénjīng huīfù bùguò lái Nerves can't recover
危险 wéixiǎn Danger
恰好 qiàhǎo exactly
夹胸 jiā xiōng clip chest
侧平举 cè píng jǔ side raise
弯举 wān jǔ Curl
彻底（仰躺，相似） chèdǐ (yǎng tǎng, xiāngsì) Thoroughly (supine, similar)
21 榨干（窄，宽） zhà gàn (zhǎi, kuān) squeezed (narrow, wide)
彻底榨干你的肌纤维 chèdǐ zhà gàn nǐ de jīxiānwéi completely drain your muscle fibers
肌肉充血的泵感 jīròu chōngxuè de bèng gǎn muscle pump
啥意思呢？ shà yìsi ne? What do you mean?
加一点重量 Jiā yīdiǎn zhòngliàng add a little weight
加一两次次数 jiā yī liǎng cì cìshù add one or two times
不断 bùduàn continuously
训练容量（训练频率） xùnliàn róngliàng (xùnliàn pínlǜ) Training capacity (training frequency)
不断地增加训练容量 bùduàn de zēngjiā xùnliàn róngliàng Constantly increasing training capacity
进步 jìnbù progress
31 明显的进步 míngxiǎn de jìnbù obvious progress
没有进步 méiyǒu jìnbù No improvement
训练强度 xùnliàn qiángdù training intensity
训练原理 xùnliàn yuánlǐ training principle
四肢的训练 sìzhī de xùnliàn limb training
一：练腿的动作 yī: Liàn tuǐ de dòngzuò One: leg exercises
拿一个哑铃 ná yīgè yǎlíng take a dumbbell
撑着哑铃 chēngzhe yǎlíng holding dumbbells
紧贴在胸前， jǐn tiē zài xiōng qián, cling to the chest,
（屁股贴到墙面） (pìgu tiē dào qiáng miàn) (ass stuck to the wall)
41 挺胸收背 tǐng xiōng shōu bèi Keep your chest up and back
宽略宽 kuān lüè kuān slightly wider
双脚站距比肩宽略宽 shuāng jiǎo zhàn jù bǐjiān kuān lüè kuān Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder width apart
可以有经微的外八 kěyǐ yǒu jīng wēi de wài bā There can be minor externalities
臀部往后推 túnbù wǎng hòu tuī buttocks pushed back
膝盖往两边打开 xīgài wǎng liǎngbiān dǎkāi open the knees to the sides
适当 shìdàng appropriate
脚尖 jiǎojiān toes
滑动 huádòng slide
顺势蹲下来了 shùnshì dūn xiàláile squatted down
51 用力站起来 yònglì zhàn qǐlái stand up hard
1：重心 1: Zhòngxīn 1: center of gravity
足弓 zú gōng arch of foot
处 chù place
重心要保持在足弓处 zhòngxīn yào bǎochí zài zú gōng chù Keep the center of gravity on the arch of the foot
不要前移或者后移 bùyào qián yí huòzhě hòu yí don't move forward or backward
2：挺直 2: Tǐng zhí 2: upright
成一条直线 （曲线） chéng yītiáo zhíxiàn (quxian) in a straight line (curve)
弯腰 wān yāo bend over
腰部 yāobù waist
61 反弓 fǎn gōng Anti-bow
没有弯腰或者腰部反弓 méiyǒu wān yāo huòzhě yāobù fǎn gōng No stooping or angina
3：膝盖的朝向 3: Xīgài de cháoxiàng 3: Direction of the knee
脚尖的方向 jiǎojiān de fāngxiàng direction of toes
一致 yīzhì unanimous
没有内扣 méiyǒu nèi kòu no buckle
4：膝盖的位置 4: Xīgài de wèizhì 4: Knee position
可以超过这个脚尖 kěyǐ chāoguò zhège jiǎojiān can go beyond this toe
稍微控制一下 shāowéi kòngzhì yì xià a little control
换上更重的哑铃 huàn shàng gèng zhòng de yǎlíng Get heavier dumbbells
71 上杠铃 shàng gànglíng on the barbell
恰好没有力气 qiàhǎo méiyǒu lìqì just have no strength
二：罗马尼亚硬拉 èr: Luómǎníyǎ yìng lā Two: Romanian Deadlift
髋部 kuān bù Hip
往前顶 wǎng qián dǐng push forward
臀部 túnbù buttocks
屈髋附身 qū kuān fù shēn hip flexion
三：侧平举 sān: Cè píng jǔ Three: side lift
抬起来 tái qǐlái lift it up
要注意身体要稳住 yào zhùyì shēntǐ yào wěn zhù Pay attention to keep your body steady
81 前后晃动 qiánhòu huàngdòng shake back and forth
不要耸肩 bùyào sǒngjiān don't shrug
轻的重量 qīng de zhòngliàng light weight
做15次以上 zuò 15 cì yǐshàng do it more than 15 times
四：肩部的后束 sì: Jiān bù de hòu shù Four: the back beam of the shoulder
面拉 miàn lā noodles
绳索 shéngsuǒ rope
把手上的绳索 bǎshǒu shàng de shéngsuǒ rope on the handle
外旋 wài xuán external rotation
往外旋的方式 wǎngwài xuán de fāngshì outward rotation
91 手肘不要低手肩 shǒu zhǒu bùyào dī shǒu jiān Do not lower your elbows to your shoulders
双手不要低于手肘 shuāngshǒu bùyào dī yú shǒu zhǒu Keep your hands below your elbows
圆肩驼背的体态 yuán jiān tuóbèi de tǐtài round-shouldered posture
很不错的改善 hěn bùcuò de gǎishàn nice improvement
接下来 jiē xiàlái next
肱二头肌的动作 gōng èr tóu jī de dòngzuò biceps action
拿一个小杠铃 ná yīgè xiǎo gànglíng take a small barbell
做杠铃弯举 zuò gànglíng wān jǔ do barbell curls
只要你站稳了 zhǐyào nǐ zhàn wěnle as long as you stand still
乱摆动 luàn bǎidòng Shake
101 手臂不要乱摆动 shǒubì bùyào luàn bǎidòng don't swing your arms
肱二头肌的刺激 gōng èr tóu jī de cìjī Stimulation of the biceps
足够深入 zúgòu shēnrù deep enough
拿起两个哑铃 ná qǐ liǎng gè yǎlíng pick up two dumbbells
虎口朝前 hǔkǒu cháo qián Going forward
交替 jiāotì alternately
锤 chuí hammer
左右交替做锤式弯举 zuǒyòu jiāotì zuò chuí shì wān jǔ Alternate left and right doing hammer curls
前臂 qiánbì forearm
前臂的刺激 qiánbì de cìjī Stimulation of the forearm
111 不要乱晃 bùyào luàn huǎng don't mess around
简单拉伸一下 jiǎndān lā shēn yīxià simply stretch
腿部的肌群 tuǐ bù de jī qún Muscles of the legs
大腿后侧 dàtuǐ hòu cè back of thigh
蛙趴（大腿内侧） wā pā (dàtuǐ nèicè) Frog Lying (Inner Thighs)
髋胫束 kuān jìng shù hip tibial band
股四头肌 gǔ sì tóu jī quadriceps
以上 yǐshàng above
以上两节课 yǐshàng liǎng jié kè The above two classes
模板 múbǎn template
121 基础训练模板 jīchǔ xùnliàn múbǎn Basic training template
照着 zhàozhe according to
照着这个模板 zhàozhe zhège múbǎn follow this template
行动 xíngdòng action
尽快行动 jǐnkuài xíngdòng act as soon as possible
换计划换动作 huàn jìhuà huàn dòngzuò change plan change action
训练计划和动作 xùnliàn jìhuà hé dòngzuò Training Programs and Movements
适应周期 shìyìng zhōuqí adaptation cycle
做熟练了 zuò shúliànle skilled
训练强度 xùnliàn qiángdù training intensity
131 强度上去了 qiángdù shàngqùle The intensity has gone up
学习阶段 xuéxí jiēduàn Learning phase
还没有适应 hái méiyǒu shìyìng haven't adapted yet
强度 qiángdù strength
很难堆上去 hěn nán duī shàngqù hard to pile up
强度就很难堆上去 qiángdù jiù hěn nán duī shàngqù Strength is hard to pile up
很难出来 hěn nán chūlái hard to come out
增肌的效果就很难出来 zēng jī de xiàoguǒ jiù hěn nán chūlái It is difficult to gain muscle

想要增重的瘦子可以先点击关注一波 Thin people who want to gain weight can first click to follow a wave
如果前面的增重课程还没有看完 If you have not finished the previous weight gain courses
建议先从第一课开始按顺序看 It is recommended to read in order from the first lesson
新手开始训练 Novices start training
肯定有一个问题 there must be a problem
“有无如何判断训练效果” "How to judge the effect of training"
其实要保证训练效果 In fact, to ensure the training effect
有两个非常实用的技巧 There are two very useful tricks
第一，是力竭 First, exhaustion
力竭的意思 Exhausted meaning
就是在一组里连续训练一个动作 It is to train one movement continuously in a group
一直做倒完成没有力气为止 Keep doing it until you run out of energy
只要你把这个动作做到力竭了 As long as you do this exercise to the exhaustion
就不会因为偷懒或者其他原因 not because of laziness or other reasons
导致练不到位 lead to poor practice
但并不是所有动作都要每组做到力竭 But not all movements need to be exhausted in each group.
像深蹲 like squats
硬拉 deadlift
卧推 bench press
划船 boating
这种大肌群的复合动作 Compound movements of this large muscle group
就不建议做到每组力竭 It is not recommended to do each set to exhaustion
不然你的神经恢复不过来 Otherwise your nerves won't recover
你的动作也会比较危险 Your actions will be more dangerous
比简易的方法是 The easier way is to
最后一组做到恰好力竭就可以了吧 The last group should be just exhausted.
而孤立动作 while isolated action
例如说夹胸 For example, chest
侧平举 side raise
弯举这些 curl these
每组做到力竭 each group to exhaustion
彻底榨干你的肌纤维是完全没有问题的 It's perfectly fine to completely dry out your muscle fibers
而且肌肉充血的泵感还会很明显 And the pump feeling of muscle congestion will be obvious
啥意思呢？ What do you mean?
就是如果你今天练得比较顺利 That is, if you practiced relatively smoothly today
动作质量也比较高 Action quality is also higher
那么下次就试试加一点重量 So next time try adding some weight
或者每组再加一两次次数 Or add one or two reps per set
你只要不断地增加训练容量 You just keep increasing your training volume
给肌肉越来越大的压力 increasing stress on the muscles
肌肉才会有明显的进步 Significant progress will be made in the muscles
有的同学练了半年 Some students practiced for half a year
都用同样的重量没有变过 All with the same weight unchanged
然后来问我 then ask me
为什么自己一点进步都没有 Why haven't I made any progress?
那当然就没有进步嘛 Of course there is no progress
你的肌肉早就应该了这个训练强度了 Your muscles should already be at this level of training intensity
就没有必要增长了 there is no need to grow
好了这些训练原理就先讲到这里 Well, let’s talk about these training principles first.
今天还是范老师 Teacher Fan today
来带大家进行四肢的训练 Let's take everyone to train the limbs
第一个练腿的动作 first leg exercise
当然就是深蹲 Squat of course
没有经验的同学 inexperienced students
可以拿一个哑铃 can take a dumbbell
从高脚杠深蹲开始 Start with high bar squats
我们双手可以这样撑着哑铃 We can hold dumbbells like this with both hands
紧贴在胸前，挺胸收背 Close to the chest, chest up and back
双脚站距比肩宽略宽 Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder width apart
可以有经微的外八 There can be minor externalities
然后臀部往后推 then push the hips back
膝盖往两边打开 open the knees to the sides
膝盖适当地往脚尖的方向滑动 Knees slide properly towards the toes
这样就顺势蹲下来了 That's how you squat down
然后大腿和臀部发力 Then the thighs and buttocks exert strength
用力站起来 stand up hard
继续重复这个动作 keep repeating this action
几个要注意的重点 A few points to note
第一，重心要保持在足弓处 First, the center of gravity should be kept at the arch of the foot
不要前移或者后移 don't move forward or backward
第二，要背要挺直成一条直线 Second, keep your back straight and in a straight line
没有弯腰或者腰部反弓 No stooping or angina
第三，膝盖的朝向和脚尖的方向一致 Third, the direction of the knee is the same as that of the toe
没有内扣 no buckle
第四，膝盖的位置 Fourth, the position of the knee
可以超过这个脚尖 can go beyond this toe
这个是根据每个人的身体比例决定的 This is determined according to each person's body proportions
你稍微控制一下 you control a little
不要超过太多就行 don't go too far
这几点做好了 These points are done
你的高脚杠深蹲就做对了 Your high bar squat is just right
如果有能力的 if able
还可以换上更重的哑铃 You can also switch to heavier dumbbells
或者上杠铃都没有问题 or the barbell is no problem
做4组，每组做8个左右 Do 4 sets of 8 reps each
组间体息1~2分钟 Rest for 1-2 minutes between groups
重量的选择上 choice of weight
控制在最后一组做完8个就恰好没有力气 Control in the last group to finish 8, just have no strength
就差不多了 almost
第二个脚部的动作来试一试罗马尼亚硬拉 Try the Romanian deadlift with a second foot movement
也就是半程的硬拉 That's half a deadlift
双手握着杠铃 holding a barbell with both hands
或者哑铃也可以 or dumbbells
挺直腰背，核心收紧 Keep your back straight and your core tight
然后往前缓慢有控制地府身下去 Then move forward slowly and under control
再用力把杠铃拉起来 Pull the barbell up again
拉起来的过程 the process of pulling up
不是要不发力 It's not about not working hard
腰腹核心是要全程用力收紧的 The core of the waist and abdomen should be tightened all the way
我们把髋部往前顶 we push our hips forward
用臀部发力 Use your hips
要特别注意的是 It is important to note that
附身下去的过程中 in the process of possessing
是屈髋附身 hip flexion
而不是弯腰 instead of bending over
要不是挺直的 if not straight
一定不能弯腰 must not bend over
做4组，每组做12个左右 Do 4 sets of about 12 reps each
组间体息1~2分钟 Rest for 1-2 minutes between groups
第三个动作 third action
我们可以开始练肩部的侧平举了 We can start doing lateral raises for the shoulders
双手握着哑铃在身体的两侧，身体站直 Hold dumbbells by your sides with both hands, standing upright
把哑铃往两边抬起来 Lift the dumbbells to the sides
抬到肩部水平的高度 Raise to shoulder level
就可以缓慢有控制地往下放了 It can be lowered slowly and in a controlled manner.
我们重复这个过程 we repeat the process
要注意身体要稳住 Pay attention to keep your body steady
不要前后晃动 don't rock back and forth
也不要耸肩 don't shrug
手臂的角度也不要有变化 Do not change the angle of the arm
这个动作你做的越慢 The slower you do this
做的越稳，感觉就越好 The more steady you do it, the better it feels
我们可以用非常轻的重量 We can use very light weight
做4组，每组做15次以上 Do 4 sets of 15 reps per set
而且每组都要做到力竭 And each group must do its best
第四个动作，练练肩部的后束 The fourth action is to practice the back of the shoulders
面拉 noodles
把手上的绳索 rope on the handle
以一个往后拉 pull back with one
往外旋的方式 outward rotation
拉近自己的脸部 pull your face closer
要注意，手肘不要低手肩 Be careful not to lower your elbows to your shoulders
双手不要低于手肘 Keep your hands below your elbows
这个动作 this action
对你的圆肩驼背的体态有很不错的改善 Great improvement for your rounded shoulders and hunched posture
每组做12~15次 Do 12-15 times per group
可以做到每组力竭为止 Can do each group until exhaustion
接下来做两个肱二头肌的动作 Next do two biceps moves
我们先拿一个小杠铃 Let's take a small barbell first
做杠铃弯举 do barbell curls
这个动作特别简单 This action is very simple
只要你站稳了 as long as you stand still
手臂不要乱摆动 don't swing your arms
直接做弯举就可以了 Just do curls
注意这个动作要做够全程 Pay attention to this action to be full
肱二头肌的刺激才足够深入 The stimulation of the biceps is deep enough
做3组，每组做12次左右 Do 3 sets of about 12 reps each
可以没组都做到力竭 You can do it without a group
然后我们拿起两个哑铃 Then we pick up two dumbbells
虎口朝前，左右交替做锤式弯举 With the tiger's mouth facing forward, do hammer curls alternately left and right
这个动作，和前面的杠铃弯举也很像 This action is very similar to the previous barbell curl
除了能够练到肱二头肌 In addition to being able to train the biceps
对前臂的刺激也会明显一些 The stimulation of the forearm will also be more obvious
要注意的是身体不要乱晃 Be careful not to shake your body
做3组，每组每边做12次左右 Do 3 sets of about 12 reps on each side
可以每组做到力竭 Can reach failure in each group
好了今天的四肢训练动作就到这里 Well, that's all for today's limb training.
练完我们可以简单拉伸一下 After training, we can simply stretch
腿部和手臂的肌群，放松一下 Muscles of the legs and arms, relax
1：拉伸大腿后侧 1: Stretch the back of the thigh
2：蛙趴（大腿内侧） 2: Frog lie (inner thigh)
3：拉伸肩部 3: Stretch the shoulders
4：拉伸肱二头肌 4: Stretch the biceps
5：放松髋胫束 5: Relax the Hip-Tibial Band
6：放松股四头肌 6: Relax the quadriceps
以上两节课 The above two classes
就是我们瘦子增重训练的一个基础训练模板 It is a basic training template for our skinny weight gain training
大家可以照着这个模板 You can follow this template
尽快行动，练起来 act fast, practice
有一点要提醒大家 one thing to remind everyone
就是不要经常换计划换动作 Just don't change plans and actions frequently
你的训练计划和动作 your training program and movements
最好稍微固定一些 better be a little fixed
连续练三个月到半年 Practice continuously for three months to half a year
再换新的会比较好 It would be better to replace it with a new one
因为新的计划 because of the new plan
或者说新的动作 or a new action
是有一个适应周期的 There is an adaptation cycle
一般就是要让身体先适应和学会这个动作怎么做 Generally, it is to let the body adapt and learn how to do this action first.
动作做熟练了 The action is proficient
你才能够增加这个动作的训练强度 You can increase the training intensity of this movement
强度上去了 The intensity has gone up
增肌的效果才会慢慢出来 The effect of muscle gain will come out slowly
但如果你的训练动作换的太快 But if your training moves change too quickly
一个新的动作还在学习阶段 A new action is still in the learning phase
还没有适应 haven't adapted yet
又换了一个新的动作的话 If you change to a new action
强度就很难堆上去 Strength is hard to pile up
增肌的效果就很难出来 It is difficult to gain muscle
